title: Uzbekistan - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: Single Entry – 3,500 BDT, Double Entry – 5,500 BDT, Multiple Entry – 7,500 BDT
processing_time: 3–5 working days (Embassy dependent) + 1–2 days file processing

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi citizens holding a valid passport (minimum 6 months from date of travel).
Applicants must submit the required digital documents and follow embassy-specific requirements.

details.title: Required Documents
items: One recent photograph (35×45 mm, JPEG format, white background)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
